column4: Ubuntu have a wallpaper pack that changes randomly the wallpaper each X minutes. How can I make a similar pack with my own images?
theres a .xml file i recall that does that. I saw a tutorial on making one ages ago on the webupd8 or omgubuntu blog site.
doing anything as root that dosent need to be done as root is a potential security issue.
does it (.xml files) works for Ubuntu 11.10?
